Header: India PM leads nation in Mahatma Gandhi tributes
Content: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi led the nation in paying homage to iconic freedom movement leader, Mahatma Gandhi at his memorial in New Delhi on his 150th birth anniversary. Modi, along with other leaders including Indian President Ram Nath Kovind, opposition Congress party leader Sonia Gandhi and former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh, offered flowers to the slain leader and remembered the father of the nation on the occasion. Along with the leaders, school children, and the general public also assembled at the memorial to pay their respects to Gandhi.
